content: I'm excited to try out these grilling tips. I've been experimenting with different BBQ recipes, and I think my friends and family will love the Spicy Pineapple BBQ Sauce. By the way, I have a big family gathering coming up, and I'm planning to grill a lot of chicken breasts. Do you have any tips on how to keep them warm and juicy after they're grilled? I don't want them to dry out while I'm serving.
